story_arc: promise → course → data-staircase → pro/con → verdict → alternatives

primary_trope.name: tier_reveal
primary_trope.hook_text: 328 races. 14 dimensions. Where does Highlands Gravel Classic land?
primary_trope.mechanism: Countdown / ranking — inherent escalation and social comparison.

beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Highlands Gravel Classic? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Highlands Gravel Classic scored 69 out of 100. Elite tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race Highlands Gravel Classic?
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Highlands Gravel Classic. Goshen, Arkansas. 67 mi. A concentrated smashfest through Ozark gravel. Tree canopy covers much of the course, providing shade but limiting descent visibility. The gravel is chunky and sharp. not smooth hardpack. Over a dozen climbs in 67 miles means you're either going up or bombing down. No recovery.
beats.text_on_screen: Highlands Gravel Classic | Goshen, Arkansas | 67 mi
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: The numbers. All fourteen of them. Logistics. 4 out of 5. Well-oiled machine. Aid stations where you need them. Goshen sits 15 minutes from Fayetteville with XNA airport access and on-site parking at the Goshen Community Center. Adventure. 4 out of 5. Remote terrain. Self-sufficiency required. The only US qualifier for UCI Gravel World Championships, racing through remote Ozark backcountry under 'a lush awning of natural woodlands. Prestige. 4 out of 5. Finishing this one means something. Unique status as the sole US qualifier for UCI Gravel World Championships draws serious talent. Race Quality. 4 out of 5. Premium race experience. UCI-standard organization handles the technical Ozark terrain professionally. Experience. 4 out of 5. Genuinely unique. Hard to replicate. A pure smashfest through beautiful but punishing Ozark terrain where elite times cluster around 3:25-3:59 for 67 miles. Community. 4 out of 5. The post-race scene is half the event. Strong NW Arkansas cycling culture supports the event, though participation lags behind European qualifiers. Field Depth. 4 out of 5. Pro-level talent in the mix. UCI qualification draws elite domestic talent including multiple-time winners Jenna Rinehart and Crystal Anthony. Value. 4 out of 5. One of the better deals in gravel. UCI World Championship qualification opportunity provides exceptional value for serious racers.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: The rest, in rapid succession. Expenses. 4 out of 5. Reasonable costs. Plan a modest budget. Technicality. 3 out of 5. Requires line choice. Rewards the attentive rider. Elevation. 3 out of 5. Proper climbing. You'll earn your descents. Climate. 3 out of 5. The weather could go either way. Length. 2 out of 5. Won't destroy your week. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Low altitude. Breathe easy.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.label: STRENGTHS
beats.narration: What Highlands Gravel Classic gets right.
beats.visual: Strengths list overlay with positive visual treatment
beats.editing_note: Warm energy. Each strength gets its own card. Avatar genuinely positive.

strengths: Only US UCI Gravel World Championship qualifier
Smashfest format rewards racing, not just surviving

beats.label: WEAKNESSES
beats.visual: Weaknesses list with warning visual treatment
beats.editing_note: MIDPOINT RE-ENGAGEMENT. This is ~55% through. Open with burst sequence (quick cuts, warning sounds). Then deliver weaknesses honestly. Preview what's coming: 'Now, should you actually do this race?' [RIFF HERE] at the transition.

weaknesses: Smaller field than major events (400-600 riders)

beats.label: LOGISTICS
beats.narration: Travel, lodging, and the unsexy details.
beats.editing_note: Utility section. Lower energy, practical value. Hybrid Tempo: alternate fast logistics items (10-15 sec) with slow map visuals (30 sec).

logistics: Lodging: Stay in Fayetteville. major college town with ample hotels and Airbnbs. University area and Dickson Street have good food options. Goshen start is 15min from Fayetteville.

beats.label: VERDICT
beats.narration: Verdict: UCI Qualifier. Yes if you're chasing UCI qualification. Yes if you want a short, intense race on technical terrain. Skip if you want ultra-endurance or smooth gravel.
beats.editing_note: CLOSE THE MAIN LOOP. 0.5s silence before verdict. Tier badge slams in. Avatar delivers final take. DO NOT signal 'wrapping up' — maintain energy.

beats.label: ALTERNATIVES
beats.narration: If Highlands Gravel Classic isn't quite right for you. Big Sugar; BWR California; SBT GRVL
beats.editing_note: Bonus value — viewers who reach this point are highly engaged. Cross-reference other videos/races.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown on the site. Fourteen scored dimensions. Free race prep kit. Link in the description.
beats.editing_note: End ABRUPTLY after CTA. No 'thanks for watching' wind-down.
beats.engagement_question: Have you raced Highlands Gravel Classic? Did we get the score right? Drop it in the comments.

meme_inserts.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic reveal pose, tier badge prominent, 'Highlands Gravel Classic' bold text, tier badge 'ELITE', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. SEO-optimize title for '[Race Name] review'.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Shorts: hook, biggest surprise score, verdict.
cross_platform_notes.blog: Cross-reference the race profile page for search traffic.
